alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Hamilton; Jefferson; Wabash; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 2:55PM CDT until June 29 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern White County in southeastern Illinois... Wayne County in south central Illinois... Southwestern Wabash County in southeastern Illinois... East central Jefferson County in south central Illinois... Southern Edwards County in southeastern Illinois... Northeastern Hamilton County in south central Illinois... West central Posey County in southwestern Indiana... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 254 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cisne, or 9 miles northwest of Fairfield, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Carmi, Fairfield, Albion, Grayville, Wayne City, Crossville, Bluford, Cisne, Jeffersonville, Sims, Mill Shoals, Browns, Springerton, Keenes, Johnsonville, Golden Gate, Belle Prairie City, Burnt Prairie and Phillipstown. This includes Interstate 64 in Illinois between Mile Markers 88 and 130. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Edwards; Hamilton; Jefferson; Wabash; Wayne; White
